title: Biden Touches Down in Maui as Search for Hundreds of Missing Drags On
description: The initial federal response to the Maui wildfires drew criticism, with reports of private volunteers doing more to provide aid to victims

title: FDA Approves the First RSV Vaccine for Pregnant Women
description: The shot is intended to protect newborns in the first few months after birth.

title: A Nightmare for Trump’s Defense Team: Everything He Says Can Be Used Against Him
description: "Any prosecutor would tell you there are few things more powerful than using a defendant’s own statements in court," says one legal expert.

title: TIME Studios Announces Leadership Changes in Continued Investment in Growth
description: TIME CEO Jessica Sibley sent the following note to staff on Monday: Team, Today, I am pleased to announce several promotions and role expansions across TIME Studios, a division that has demonstrated tremendous growth, generating more than $100M in revenue in its first three years. To position the division for continued success, the following individuals…

title: ‘I’m So Disappointed’ About Abortion Status in the U.S., Says New CDC Director
description: Dr. Mandy Cohen, the new director of the CDC spoke with TIME on COVID-19, women’s health, and her vision for the embattled public health agency.

title: Breaking Down the Final Fight Scene of Blue Beetle
description: The final epic fight in Blue Beetle finds the hero Jamie fully teaming up with the Scarab

title: Writing for Friends Was No Dream Job
description: People ask Patty Lin why she quit writing for TV. Her disillusionment began at her very first writing job—and continued when she landed a gig on America's favorite sitcom.

title: The Head of Spain’s Soccer Federation Is Under Fire for Inappropriate World Cup Celebrations
description: Spanish soccer federation president Luis Rubiales has apologized for kissing a player on the mouth after the women’s team won the World Cup.

title: Jenna Lyons Is Breaking All the Unwritten Rules of Real Housewives
description: Jenna Lyons, a fashion powerhouse, has become a fan favorite and the biggest star of the newly rebooted 'Real Housewives of New York.'

title: British Nurse Lucy Letby Imprisoned for Life for Murder of 7 Babies
description: Former U.K. nurse Lucy Letby killed seven babies, and attempted to kill six others in her care, was sentenced to life in prison.

title: Saudi Arabian Border Guards Accused of Killing Hundreds of Ethiopian Migrants
description: Border guards fired at and likely killed hundreds of Ethiopian migrants in recent years, said Human Rights Watch.

title: Why Trump’s Rivals Think They Can Stop Him in Iowa
description: The GOP primary hinges on the same question that has perplexed the political system for years: How do you stop Trump?

title: Why the Georgia Court Will Keep the Trump Case—and Why It Shouldn’t
description: What happens in Fulton County has to stay in the Fulton County Courthouse

title: Hanoi Wants Tourists to Stop Visiting One of the City’s Most Popular Tourist Attractions
description: Vietnamese authorities have been trying to shut down “Train Street” over mounting safety concerns. But tourists just won’t stop coming.

title: China Stops Importing Taiwan’s Mangoes, Blaming Pests Amid Political Tensions
description: China has used fruit in diplomacy before, and the suspension comes days after Beijing announced naval and airforce drills as a “stern warning” to what it called Taiwan independence forces.

title: China Intensifies Espionage Crackdown Targeting Alleged Spies for the CIA
description: Beijing has ratcheted up efforts to crack down on spying and adopted a new counter-espionage law that came into effect last month.

title: Guatemalans Overwhelmingly Vote for Change With Progressive Candidate Bernardo Arévalo
description: With more than 99% of the votes counted, the Supreme Electoral Tribunal called Arévalo—who led former first lady Sandra Torres by 58% to 37%—the “virtual winner,” though the results are pending certification.

title: More Elderly While Population Growth Slows to Put Australian Budget Under Pressure
description: Growth in the care economy is set to be one of the most prominent shifts in coming decades, with the number of elderly citizens predicted to swell, while overall population growth slows.
